eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.wrench

Interface Wrenchable


  • public interface Wrenchable
    Implement this when you want your machine to do something when it gets wrenched.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onWrench(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack, net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player, net.minecraft.world.World world, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.util.EnumHand hand, net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing facing, net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state, float hitX, float hitY, float hitZ)
      Called when a player uses a wrench on a tile entity.

    • Method Detail

      • onWrench

        boolean onWrench(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                 net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player,
                 net.minecraft.world.World world,
                 net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                 net.minecraft.util.EnumHand hand,
                 net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing facing,
                 net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state,
                 float hitX,
                 float hitY,
                 float hitZ)
        Called when a player uses a wrench on a tile entity.
        Parameters:
        stack - The ItemStack wrench
        player - The player
        world - The world
        pos - The block position
        hand - The hand being used
        facing - The side of the block hit
        state - The current blockstate.
        hitX - See Item#onItemUseFirst
        hitY - See Item#onItemUseFirst
        hitZ - See Item#onItemUseFirst
        Returns:
        Whether it was successful
